name: planted.skewers
description: Juicy, smoky skewers marinated with herbs and lemon zest. Perfect for grill or pan.
longDescription: Fire up the grill with our planted.skewers Herbs. Marinated with fresh herbs and zesty lemon, they deliver juicy, smoky flavor with every bite. Made from just a few natural ingredients - peas, rapeseed oil, water, salt, and vitamin B12 - they're perfect for summer BBQs or quick weeknight dinners.
ingredients: Water, pea protein, rapeseed oil, lemon zest, herbs, pea fiber, natural flavoring, salt, vitamin B12
preparation: Grill or pan-fry for 8-10 minutes, turning occasionally. Serve with tzatziki, fresh salad, and warm pita bread.
